name: @nlp-manager/packages
author: ≈Åukasz Marek Sielski <lukaszsielski@gmail.com>
description: Web/Desktop tool for managing and testing bots based on nlp.js

scripts.dev:old: concurrently -k "yarn workspace @nlp-manager/ui run electron" "yarn run wait:electron"
scripts.wait:electron: wait-on tcp:8082 && yarn workspace @nlp-manager/electron run start
